S04bsu014_u:2719: te apramāṇabalabuddhi vicārayantaḥ susūkṣmajñānaparamā jagatā durjñeyā /
S04bsu014_u:2720: tatha guhyasthāna sugatāna samosaranto bhūmiṃ kramanti navamīṃ jagato 'rthakarīm // 14 //
S04bsu014_u:2721: te dhāraṇīmukhi samādhisamāhitāgrā vipulā abhijñā api kṣetrapraveśanantam /
S04bsu014_u:2723: te atra bhūmyanugatā jinakośadhārī kuśalāśca dharmakuśalāśca avyākṛtāśca /
S04bsu014_u:2724: ye sāsravā api ca laukika ye ca āryāścintyā acintiya vidū anubuddhyayanti // 16 //
S04bsu014_u:2726: bhūmidharma yathā-adhimukti pracārataśca abhisaṃskaronti yatha lokya tathotaranti // 17 //
S04bsu014_u:2727: te evajñānanugatā varasūkṣmabuddhī sattvāna cittagahanaṃ parimārgayanti /
S04bsu014_u:2731: tatha karmapraveśa vicitravibhaktitaśca hetū niruddhaphalanāśa samotaranti // 19 //
S04bsu014_u:2733: indriya yā mṛdukamadhya udārataśca saṃbhedapūrvamaparānta samotaranti /
S04bsu014_u:2734: adhimukti naika vividhā śubha āśubhataśca catvāri āśīti sahasra samotaranti // 20 //
S04bsu014_u:2735: dhātūpraveśa jaga bhāvitakleśadṛṣṭī gahanaṃ gatā anavarāgra acchedataśca /
S04bsu014_u:2736: ye āśayā anuśayā sahajapracārī cittāsamosṛta nibaddha accheda tanti // 21 //
S04bsu014_u:2737: cittaṃ yathā anuśayā na ca dravyabhūto na ca deśasthā na ca vipravasanti āśayā /
S04bsu014_u:2738: durheya dhyānaviṣayānabhivartiyāśca chedaśca mārga vinayena na cānyamasti // 22 //
S04bsu014_u:2739: upapatti ṣaḍgati vibhaktipraveśataśca snehaṃ ca tṛṣṇamavidyāndhaka karmakṣetrā /
S04bsu014_u:2741: te vāsanāgati kileśa ca karma cittā suvihāratāya na punargatisanta kāmā /
S04bsu014_u:2743: evaṃ visaraṇagatāḥ sthita atra bhūmyāṃ sarvasattva āśaya yathendriya yādhimuktiḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2744: teṣāmarthe dharmavibhakti prakāśayanti pratisaṃvidarthakuśalāḥ pratibhā nirukti // 25 //
S04bsu014_u:2747: abhipravarṣanti madhuramamṛtasya varṣaṃ bhujagendrasāgara yathā anupūrayanti // 26 //
S04bsu014_u:2749: te dhāraṇī daśa asaṃkhyasahasra labdhā dhāranti dharma yatha (sāgara varṣadhārī) // 27 //
S04bsu014_u:2750: evaṃ ca dhāraṇiviśuddhisamādhiprāptā ekakṣaṇena daśabuddhasahasra dṛṣṭāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2754: toṣenti sarva yathaindriya-āśayāśca catudvīpasāgara varṣā sama modayanti // 29 //
S04bsu014_u:2757: deśeyu dharma sugatāḥ puna nānasattvaṃ śrutvā dharema yatha sarvada (bījadhārī) // 30 //
S04bsu014_u:2758: (yāvatakā) jagadiha praviśanti sattvāḥ (te sarva ekapariṣanmaṇḍale niṣaṇṇāśca) /
S04bsu014_u:2759: eṣāṃ ca ekakṣaṇi sarvi samotaritvā ekāṃ rutena imi tarpayitavya sarve // 31 //
S04bsu014_u:2762: rātriṃdivaṃ sada jinaiḥ śamathānuprāptā gambhīra śānta sthita jñānavimokṣadhīrā // 32//
S04bsu014_u:2766: tasya kleśagahanāni prabhā samājya brahmaṇo va dvisahasrikalokadhātuḥ // 33 //
S04bsu014_u:2785: vastrakaiḥ samakarī sagauravā bhrāmayanti rucirān varān śatam // 3 //
S04bsu014_u:2786: apsarā bahava prīṇitendriyāḥ pūjayanti sugataṃ sagauravāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2788: ekakṣetra sugato niṣaṇṇakaḥ sarvakṣetri pratibhāsa darśayī /
S04bsu014_u:2790: ekaromu sugatasya raśmayo niścaranti jagakleśa śāmyati /
S04bsu014_u:2798: garbhaprāpta bahukṣetrakoṭiṣu jāyamāna kvaci kṣetra dṛśyate // 8 //
S04bsu014_u:2799: niṣkramanta jagahetu nāyako budhyamāna puna bodhimuttamām /
S04bsu014_u:2802: māyakāra yatha vidyaśikṣito jīvikārtha bahukāya darśayī /
S04bsu014_u:2806: yatha svabhāvu sugatānagocarā sarvasattva tatha prāpta dharmatām /
S04bsu014_u:2808: ye tu jñāna sugatāna arthiṃke kalpakalpaparikalpavarjitam /
S04bsu014_u:2811: marukanyā jinaṃ lokya tūṣṇībhūtāḥ śame ratāḥ // 14 //
S04bsu014_u:2816_0: atha khalu vajragarbho bodhisattvo daśadiśaṃ vyavalokya sarvāvatīṃ parṣadaṃ vyavalokya
S04bsu014_u:2816_1: dharmadhātuṃ ca vyavalokayan sarvajñatācittotpādaṃ ca saṃvarṇayan bodhisattvaviṣayamādarśayan
S04bsu014_u:2816_4: evameva bhūmyarthaṃ prarūpayamāṇo buddhānubhāvena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu014_u:2820: khilamanavidhutānāṃ mārgajñāne sthitānāṃ śṛṇuta cariviśeṣān bodhisattvāna śreṣṭhān // 17 //
S04bsu014_u:2821: kuśalaśatasahasraṃ saṃciyā kalpakoṭyā buddhaśatasahasrān pūjayitvā maharṣīn /
S04bsu014_u:2825: yāva jina triyadhvā pūjanārthāya pūjaṃ khagapathapariṇāmaṃ śodhanaṃ sarvakṣetram /
S04bsu014_u:2826: samyaganugatārthe yāvatā sarvadharmān mokṣa jagata arthe jāyate bodhicittam // 20 //
S04bsu014_u:2833: pracalitaśubhakāryā dhīravīryotsahā ye nikhilajanahitārthe prodyayāmāna siṃhāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2835: avirataguṇasādhyā nirjitakleśasaṃghā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 24 //
S04bsu014_u:2837: śamasukhaniratā ye tyaktasaṃsārasaṅgā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 25//
S04bsu014_u:2839: jinapadaśaraṇasthā labdhatattvārthakā ye sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 26 //
S04bsu014_u:2841: sugataguṇasamīhā ye ca puṇyānurāgāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 27 //
S04bsu014_u:2842: tribhuvanahitakāmā bodhisaṃbhārapūrye praṇihitamanasā ye duṣkare 'pi caranti /
S04bsu014_u:2843: avirataśubhakarmaprodyatā bodhisattvāḥ sapadi manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 28 //
S04bsu014_u:2845: anugataśubhamārgā labdhadharmārthakāmā jhaṭiti manasi teṣāṃ jāyate bodhicittam // 29 //
S04bsu014_u:2846: iti gaṇitaguṇāṃśā bodhicaryāścarantu jinapadapraṇidhānāḥ satsamṛddhiṃ labhantu /
S04bsu014_u:2847: triguṇapariviśuddhā bodhicittaṃ labhantu triśaraṇapariśuddhā bodhisattvā bhavantu // 30 //
S04bsu014_u:2920: dharmameghāṃ tataḥ prāpto maheśvaro bhavet kṛtī // 65 //
S04bsu014_u:2929: tathā bodhiṃ śivāṃ prāpya caturmārān vijitya ca /
S04bsu014_u:2936: etāstāḥ khalu punarbho jinaputrā daśa bodhisattvabhūmayaḥ samāsato nirdiṣṭāḥ sarvākāravaropetasarvajñajñānānugatā draṣṭavyāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2937: tasyāṃ velāyāmayaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prākampat /
S04bsu014_u:2941_0: atha tasmin samaye bhagavāṃstān vimukticandrapramukhān sarvān bodhisattvānāmantrya
S04bsu014_u:2941_2: samyaksaṃbodhiṃ yuṣmākaṃ haste parindāmi anuparindāmi paramayā parindanayā /
S04bsu014_u:2942: tadyūyaṃ sarve svayaṃ caivamimaṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ dhārayata,
S04bsu014_u:2944: saṃkṣepānmārṣā yadi tathāgataḥ kalpasthitikenāyuḥpramāṇena rātriṃdivamadhitiṣṭhamāno 'sya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S04bsu014_u:2948: evameva mārṣā ya imaṃ dharmaparyāyamudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati likhiṣyati likhāpayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S04bsu014_u:2949_0: parṣanmadhye ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayiṣyati - anena cittena kathamamī sattvā evamudāradharmasya
S04bsu014_u:2949_1: lābhinaḥ syuriti śraddhayā satkṛtya śrāvayiṣyanti śroṣyanti ca yoniśo manasi bhāvayiṣyanti ca /
S04bsu014_u:2950: pustakalikhitaṃ kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati /
S04bsu014_u:2951: amātsaryacittatayā asya dharmaparyāyasya varṇaṃ bhāṣitvā likhanāya vācanāya svādhyayanāya pūjanāya darśanāya dāsyati,
S04bsu014_u:2953: atha khalu bhagavānasyaiva dharmaparyāyasya bhūyasyā mātrayā anuparindanārthaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
S04bsu014_u:2954: sattvā dṛṣṭā ye mayā buddhadṛṣṭyā te 'rhantaḥ syuḥ śāriputreṇa tulyāḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2956: pratyekabuddhāya tu yaśca pūjāṃ kuryādahorātramapi prahṛṣṭaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2958: sarve 'pi pratyekajinā yadi syustān pūjayet kaścidihāpramattaḥ /
S04bsu014_u:2961: ekasya yaścaiva tathāgatasya kuryāt praṇāmamapi caikavāram /
S04bsu014_u:2962: prasannacitto 'tha vadennamo 'rhan tasmādidaṃ śreṣṭhataraṃ ca puṇyam // 4 //
S04bsu014_u:2963: buddhā bhaveyuryadi sarvasattvāstān pūjayet yaśca yathaiva pūrvam /
S04bsu014_u:2964: divyaiśca puṣpairatha mānuṣaiśca kalpānanekān bahubhiḥ prakāraiḥ // 5 //
S04bsu014_u:2965: yaścaiva saddharmavilopakāle tyaktvā svakāyaṃ ca tathātmajīvam /
S04bsu014_u:2966: dadyādahorātramidaṃ hi sūtraṃ viśiṣyate puṇyamidaṃ hi tasmāt // 6 //
S04bsu014_u:2968: dṛḍhaṃ samutpādya sa bodhicittam idaṃ sadā sūtravaraṃ dadātu // 7 //
S04bsu014_u:2970: gṛhe sthitastasya tathāgataḥ sa tiṣṭhedidaṃ yatra hi sūtraratnam // 8 //
S04bsu014_u:2971: prabhāṃ sa prāpnoti śubhāmanantām ekaṃ padaṃ vādi śatīhayaśca /
S04bsu014_u:2972: na vyañjanād grasyati nāpi cārthād dadāti yaḥ sūtramidaṃ parebhyaḥ // 9 //
S04bsu014_u:2973: anuttarāsau naranāyakānāṃ sattvo na kaścit sadṛśo 'sya vidyate /
S04bsu014_u:2974: bhavetsamudreṇa samaśca so 'kṣayaḥ śrutvā hi yo dharmamimaṃ prapadyate // 10 //
S04bsu014_u:2975: According the edition by Ryūkḥ Kondḥ (reproduced Kyoto 1983)
S04bsu014_u:2976: the end of the sūtra is:
S04bsu014_u:2977_0: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te vimukticandrapūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvagaṇā vaśavartidevarājapramukhāḥ
S04bsu014_u:2977_2: ca lokaḥ sā sarvāvatī parṣad bhagavato vajragarbhasya bhāṣitam abhyanandann iti //
S04bsu014_u:2979: iti śrībodhisattvacaryāprasthāno daśabhūmīśvaro nāma mahāyānasūtraratnarājaḥ samāptaḥ //
S04bsu014_u:2980: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetun teṣāṃ tathāgato hy avadat /
S04bsu014_u:2981: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
